definition: to walk (side part of split character)
catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g
in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
to press on towards/to close in on/to approach/to draw near

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新办公室离公共交通工具，地铁或者公共汽车站近吗？

sentences.english: Nearly 3 weeks of continuous heavy rains and floods in eastern Australia, calamity-ridden.
sentences.chinese: 连续近3周的暴雨和洪水使澳大利亚东部灾难深重。

sentences.english: The scheme has a present value of nearly $270, 000 to a new recipient.
sentences.chinese: 一位新的补助成员现在可以领取近27万美元。

sentences.english: He’s perhaps the most well-known painter from all of the 20:th century.
sentences.chinese: 他或许是近一个世纪以来最负盛名的艺术家。

sentences.english: The main transportation sand stone material, evening does, best leaves Pan Lijin.
sentences.chinese: 主要运输沙石料，晚上干，最好离潘里近的。

sentences.english: The chalk headland of Beachy Head near Eastbourne in East Sussex. (Jason Hawkes)
sentences.chinese: 东萨西克斯近伊斯特本的多沙砾海角。

sentences.english: As of today, nearly 30,000 confirmed cases have been reported in 74 countries.
sentences.chinese: 截至今天，在74个国家已报告了近3万起确诊病例。

sentences.english: Then the price of oil began a nearly two-decade slide.
sentences.chinese: 随后，石油价格开始了近二十年的下滑。

sentences.english: The pain had become constant in the last two months and was associated with diarrhea and tenesmus.
sentences.chinese: 近二个月有持续疼痛的情形，且合并腹泻及裹急后重。

sentences.english: Probe errors analysis and correction are the key technique in time domain near field measurement.
sentences.chinese: 探头误差分析和修正是时域近场测量中的关键技术。

sentences.english: Then the eye is relaxed for distance and the entire amount of focusing ability is available to see close.
sentences.chinese: 远视的眼睛得以松弛，用全部调焦能力近看。
里面的桌子“脸贴脸”，靠的很近。

sentences.english: It's a smell that's so good you want to smell it again, to get closer.
sentences.chinese: 那是一种是好闻到令你想靠得更近再闻一次的气味。

sentences.english: The coal mining area around Jiaozuo City has a history of nearly 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 焦作市煤矿区是一个有着近百年历史的老矿区。

sentences.english: And the research is further evidence that pesticides are a potential cause.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究近一步显示刹虫剂是潜在影响因素。

sentences.english: In 2015, nearly 400,000 oversea students swarmed into the Chinese market.
sentences.chinese: 2015年，近40万国际学生蜂拥来到中国市场。

to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
up to/no less than/as much as
